attributes.action: undertake to bring about a reduction in the size of government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To propose no legislation that increases the overall size of goverment, the number of laws, increases the tax burden at the national or local level above the rate of inflation, or increases the government's share of spending of the GDP, unless passed by 2/3s majority in both houses of parliament. That any new legislation should automatically lapse after five years unless it can be shown to meet these criterias through an independent audit.
